Module org.example.projectpart1
Package org.example.projectpart1

Class Bill

java.lang.Object
org.example.projectpart1.Bill
public class Bill extends Object
Represents a bill associated with an order in a restaurant.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Bill()
    Constructs a bill with a pending status and assigns it a unique bill ID.
    Bill(int customerId, Date date, ArrayList<String> items)
    Constructs a bill with the specified customer ID, date, and items.

    • Bill

      public Bill(int customerId, Date date, ArrayList<String> items)
      Constructs a bill with the specified customer ID, date, and items.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer associated with the bill.
      date - The date of the bill creation.
      items - The list of items included in the bill.

      Parameters:

      prices - The prices corresponding to the items in the menu.
